Text: Not hard coded with subs for alien language!!

There's a subs file with the download, not hard to use. There is currently no seeder on this file though and only 94% available (hundreds of leechers). Someone please seed this back to life. From the sample it looks like perfect quality

No, there isn't.  The sub file is missing for this one; the four files are the sample avi, the avi, a jpg of a poster and an nfo file.
